## Workspace.removeTypedBlock() method

Remove a block from the list of blocks keyed by type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeTypedBlock(block: Block): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | Block to remove. |

**Returns:**

void
